name: Working With Monsters
description: Alexander Charbonneau was a highly accomplished 11th century Sorcerer, Seer and advisor to William the Conqueror, he lived a torrid and violent life. His obsession was immortality, the quest for which led him to carry out all manner of atrocities on animals and people alike. Eventually he took an interest in Vampirism, which he saw as a primitive form of immortality, although the price that came with it – the destruction the immortal soul – was one that he could not bear to pay.   Now, in 1920's England he needs the help of some broad minded investigators...
